snippet: Egypt and Hamas made efforts to restore calm on Sunday, as cross-border violence between Israel and smaller Palestinian groups killed two civilians.

byline.original: By FARES AKRAM and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Fares Akram reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Egypt and Hamas made efforts to restore calm on Sunday, as cross-border violence between Israel and smaller Palestinian groups killed two civilians.

headline.seo: Gaza Fighting Continues, Despite Truce Efforts
headline.main: Gaza Fighting Continues, Despite Truce Efforts
headline.print_headline: Gaza Fighting Continues, Despite Truce Efforts
